name: ConnectAde
tag_list: care, caregiver, caregiving, family, communicate, connect
overview: ConnectAde is an online tool to help you care for mom and/or dad by helping you make the necessary care connections with the countless number of services and professionals involved in caregiving (e.g. nursing homes, attorneys, advisors, doctors, pet sitters, transportation, etc.). Follow ConnectAde’s customized Care Action Plans to find out how to be a great caregiver, and simply click on each Step of the Plan to be connected to local services that can help. Meanwhile, communicate with the extended family and manage mom and dad’s calendar on your secure Account Profile page.
